subject: New York City Triathlon
lead_paragraph: The 15th annual New York City Triathlon began with a swimming phase in the Hudson River, followed by a biking stage on the Henry Hudson Parkway and a run in Central Park.
snippet: The 15th annual New York City Triathlon began with a swimming phase in the Hudson River, followed by a biking stage on the Henry Hudson Parkway and a run in Central Park.
